definitions.definition: To gain (an object or desired result).
definitions.example: To attain such a high level of proficiency requires hours of practice each day.

definitions.definition: To reach or come to, by progression or motion; to arrive at (a place, time, state, etc.).
To come or arrive, by motion, growth, bodily exertion, or efforts toward a place, object, state, etc.
To get at the knowledge of.
To reach in excellence or degree.
To reach a person after being behind them.
